title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8143.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8143.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 145. Route 145 between Route 7 and the Albany county line, in the Towns of

Cobleskill, Middleburgh, Broome and the Village of Middleburgh. (b) US Route 20. US Route 20 between Route
30A and the Otsego county line, a distance of 17.5+- miles in the Towns of

Sharon, Carlisle, and Esperance and the Village of Sharon Springs. (c) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also
subd. (c) below.] Route 30A. Route
30A between IR 88 (exit 23) and Route 7, a distance of 0.3+- mile in the Town
of Schoharie. (c) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996 until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (c) above and below.] Route 30A. Route 30A
between Route 30 and Route 7, a distance of 1.2+- miles in the Town of

Schoharie. (c) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (c) above.] Route
30A. Route 30A between IR 88 (exit 23) and Route 30 in the Town of

Schoharie. (d) Route 30A. Route 30A
between Route 7 and US Route 20, a distance of 3.9 +- miles in the Towns of

Schoharie and Esperance. (e) Route
7. Route 7 between Route 30A and Route 30A, a distance of 1.2+- miles in the

Town of Schoharie. (f) Route 443. Route 443 between the Albany county line and Route 30, a distance of 7.3+-
miles in the Towns of Wright and Schoharie. (g) Route 23. Route 23 between the

Schoharie-Delaware county line and the Schoharie-Delaware county line in the

Town of Gilboa. (h) Route 30. Route
30 between the Schoharie-Delaware county line and Route 30A, in the Towns of

Gilboa, Blenheim, Fulton, Middleburg and Schoharie and the Villages of

Middleburg and Schoharie. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8143.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
